ygData.subject: Instill Doubt (was:Re: Skills Survey)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Acutally ID is usefull when you are Fear/Chaining, as it gives an extra fear chance which never hurts.  In the last two nights I have raised my ID 14 pts
ygData.messageBody:
>Hey, you forgot one of my favorites: Instill Doubt. Not that it's
>useful or anything, but it amuses the party in those boring down moments.
>(The "you're not scaring anybody" message still cracks me up.) I also
>have fishing close to maxed, and begging at nearly 70. With fishing I
>can yank in a fish almost every cast now (which replenishes a low food
>supply quite quickly). Begging, on the other hand, stinks. I've never
>managed to get more than a silver. But, by Mithaniel Marr, I'm gonna max
>it just to see if it ever gets better!
>
>Kenross Cantoforjado, 32 songs, Innoruuk

Acutally ID is usefull when you are Fear/Chaining, as it gives an extra fear
chance which never hurts. In the last two nights I have raised my ID 14 pts
to 57, long boring camp for a Guise. I know have a base charisma of 141 :)


Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
